Uses of Package
org.glite.authz.common.http

Packages that use org.glite.authz.common.http
org.glite.authz.common.http This package contains base classes for working with an embedded Jetty server and creating HttpServlet objects. 
 

Classes in org.glite.authz.common.http used by org.glite.authz.common.http
AbstractAdminCommand
          Base class for administration commands which may be registered with a JettyAdminService.
BaseHttpServlet
          A base class for Servlets within the authorization service.
ShutdownTask
          A task to be run at shutdown time by the JettyAdminService.
